item.title: Chaos Zero Nightmare
item.description: Actively farming characters Mei-Lin Memory FragmentsTarget DeckPotentials✅️ 18/18✅️ 2/5 +2✅️ 9/9 Details → Mika Memory FragmentsTarget DeckPotentials❌️ 0/6❌️ 1/3 +2❌️ Details →.
Chizuru is interesting, but doesn’t really add anything new to my lineup since Mei-Lin is already strong single-target.

item.title: Colophon
item.description: This site is build with Quartz v4, which is a static-site generator that transforms a folder of Markdown files into a website.

item.title: Duplicating cards effectively
item.description: A lot of characters benefit greatly from having a key card duplicated as many times as possible.

item.title: Games
item.description: This section of the wiki will be for compiling information about the games I play.

item.title: direnv
item.description: direnv lets you define environment variables to be loaded only within certain directories.

item.title: Mika
item.description: Mika Memory Fragments (18/18) Set Bonuses Primaries Legendary? 6/6 5/6 5/6 Target Deck (4/6) Basic attack Remove Basic heal Remove 1 Source of Water Decrease cost when recovering Duplicate Blessing of Waves Gain shield for overheal Tactical Analysis Upgrade Potentials () Unique Card Upgrade 10/10 .
